data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Niedersachsen to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Niedersachsen, Germany
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help get online Bibles and Bible apps onto the phones of the 4,691,994 people who claim to know you, so they can read everyday.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 47 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 7,928,800 people living in Niedersachsen through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Niedersachsen, Germany to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the South Asian, general people.
Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Niedersachsen to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.prayer: Father, let love abound more and more in the church of Niedersachsen, Germany.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Niedersachsen, Germany.
